products.name: iPhone 14 pro
products.description: A budget-friendly iPhone with a 4.7-inch Retina HD display, A13 Bionic chip, and a single-camera system with Portrait mode and 4K video.

products.name: iPhone 12
products.description: A popular smartphone from Apple, featuring a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A14 Bionic chip, 5G connectivity, and a dual-camera system with Night mode.

products.name: iphone 100 Pro max
products.description: The latest flagship smartphone from Apple, featuring a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, 5G connectivity, and a dual-camera system with Night mode.

products.name: iPhone 13 Pro
products.description: The premium version of the iPhone 13, featuring a 6.1-inch or 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology, A15 Bionic chip, 5G connectivity, and a triple-camera system with Night mode.

products.name: iPhone XR
products.description: A previous generation iPhone with a 6.1-inch Liquid Retina HD display, A12 Bionic chip, and a single-camera system with Portrait mode and

products.name: iPhone 21 pro
products.description: A budget-friendly iPhone with a 4.7-inch Retina HD display, A13 Bionic chip, and a single-camera system with Portrait mode and 4K video.

products.name: iPhone SE
products.description: A compact iPhone with a 4.7-inch Retina HD display, A13 Bionic chip, and Touch ID.

products.name: AirPods Pro
products.description: The AirPods Pro are the top-of-the-line wireless earbuds from Apple. They feature noise cancellation technology, transparency mode, and a customizable fit for maximum comfort. With up to 4.5 hours of listening time on a single charge and a wireless charging case, these earbuds are perfect for those who want high-quality audio on-the-go.

products.name: AirPods Max
products.description: The AirPods Max are Apple's first over-ear headphones, and they are designed to deliver high-fidelity audio with active noise cancellation. With a sleek and stylish design, these headphones feature a breathable knit mesh canopy and ear cushions that distribute the weight evenly for maximum comfort. They offer up to 20 hours of battery life on a single charge and come with a soft, slim Smart Case that protects your headphones while they're not in use.

products.name: AirPods
products.description: The AirPods are Apple's original wireless earbuds, and they are still a popular choice for those who want a simple and reliable audio experience. With up to 5 hours of listening time on a single charge and a charging case that provides multiple charges, these earbuds are great for everyday use. They offer easy setup and automatic on/off, and they work seamlessly with all your Apple devices.

products.name: Apple Watch Series 7
products.description: The latest version of Apple's popular smartwatch, featuring a larger always-on Retina display, faster charging, and new watch faces and workout modes.

products.name: Apple Watch SE
products.description: A more affordable version of the Apple Watch, featuring the same powerful S5 chip, fall detection, and heart rate monitoring as the Series 5 and 6.

products.name: Apple Watch Series 3
products.description: An entry-level version of the Apple Watch, featuring GPS, heart rate monitoring, and water resistance up to 50 meters.
